Job Posting:166191 - Position: S25 UI Systems Developer, Co-op Student 166191 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/14/2025 11:59 PM Through Employer Website 01/24/2025 11:42 AM Expired ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Healthcare of Ontario Pension Plan Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2025 - Summer S25 UI Systems Developer, Co-op Student 166191 Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 or 8 months CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Job Title: UI Systems Developer, Co-op Student (Summer 2025 - 4 or 8 months) Job ID: JR101937 Application Deadline: February 14, 2025 **please note that this is a 4-month work term and optional 8-months Why you'll love working here: • high-performance, people-focused culture • our commitment that equity, diversity and inclusion are fundamental to our work environment and business success, which helps employees feel valued and empowered to be their authentic selves • learning and development initiatives, including workshops, Speaker Series events and access to LinkedIn Learning, that support employees' career growth • optional membership in HOOPP's world class defined benefit pension plan, which can serve as an important part of your retirement security • virtual fitness, yoga and meditation classes, nutritional consultations and wellness seminars • flexible hybrid work model that embraces remote work • the opportunity to make a difference and help take care of those who care for us, by providing a financially secure retirement for Ontario healthcare workers Job Summary Passionate about software development? Want exposure to the ins and outs of investments and the myriad systems that make it all happen? Willing to be a self-directed member of an agile and highly collaborative team, and organization? If you answered yes to any of these questions, we want to hear from you! The Investment Solutions Group focuses on delivering state-of-the-art technological solutions to our stakeholders which includes traders, portfolio managers, and cross functional teams. We have a wide range of opportunities in systems designed for multi-asset trading, quantitative analysis, risk management, enterprise data warehousing, and micro-services for inter-application integrations. You will be exposed to a broad spectrum of investment management projects that involve front, mid, and back office stakeholders and make real, tangible impacts on HOOPP's performance. As a software developer, you will contribute to transformative projects in finance and take part in shaping opportunities at the pace of global markets. At HOOPP, you'll have the chance to work on diverse teams and projects, reflecting our dynamic business and your evolving skills. You'll join a thriving community of technologists in a flat organization that values collaboration, creativity, and teamwork. UI Developers at HOOPP are not just problem-solvers; they are innovators, building advanced UI applications, designing intuitive user interfaces, and coding scalable solutions for investment trading, risk management, enterprise data, quantitative analysis, and microservice architecture. We seek developers who are versatile, design-focused, eager to tackle challenges, and driven to deliver seamless experiences across the full stack. Duties and Responsibilities: • Collaborate with the team to transform business and analytical requirements into technical designs and implementation strategies. • Break down complex business needs into smaller, manageable tasks with clear deliverables. • Write clean, maintainable, and testable code that aligns with business requirements and delivery goals. • Enhance and refine UI applications to ensure they adhere to UX best practices and align with established design guidelines. • Work closely with cross-functional teams to create integrated and reusable solutions. Offer prompt support to business teams by investigating and resolving technical issues or anomalies as they arise. • Job Requirements Qualifications and Skills: • Pursuing a diploma or degree in computer science, computer engineer bachelor's degree program or equivalent work experience • Strong interpersonal and communication skills with an ability to take end-to-end ownership • Understanding of software design patterns and proficiency with modern development tools such as Git, CI/CD pipelines, and unit testing frameworks. • Basic knowledge of web development technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript. • Experience with UI frameworks like React, Angular, or Razor is advantageous. • Familiarity with UI and UX design principles is a valuable asset. • Proficiency in at least one general-purpose programming language or framework such as C#, Java, or JavaScript. A portfolio showcasing past projects or contributions to open-source initiatives is a strong plus. • Behaviours We Value: • Accountable to yourself and your teammates • High enthusiasm with a sense of urgency to get things done • Critical thinker, problem solver, value driven, decision maker • Continuous improvement, accepts and gives constructive feedback Curiosity for learning and a hungry mind! • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? No Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://hoopp.wd3.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/HOOPPStudent/job/Toronto-Ontario-Canada/UI-Systems-Developer--Co-op- Student--Summer-2025---4-or-8-months-_JR101937 Application requirements: Resume only Application Deadline: February 14, 2025 Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
